Title: Includes the examination of tinted or shaded front windshields and driver's side and passenger side windows in the periodic inspection of motor vehicles
Summary: Includes the examination of tinted or shaded front windshields and driver's side and passenger side windows in the periodic inspection of motor vehicles.
LawCode: Amd ยง301, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to including the examination of tinted or shaded front windshields and driver's side and passenger side windows in the periodic inspection of motor vehicles
